thread.section_title: HiFX New Zealand Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of HiFX New Zealand | www.hifx.co.nz
thread.title: Keely
thread.title_full: HiFX New Zealand reviewed by Keely

author: Keely
title: Keely
text:
I had no idea hifx even existed but for a chance conversation with someone in the finance industry. I was initially a little apprehensive about transferring proceeds from the uk as I did not understand how it all worked and was worried about the safety and legitimacy of it all. Seems ridiculous now ! I was able to phone directly and ask for an explanation about what hifx was, how it worked and how would it benefit me as opposed to using the bank for international transfer as I always had done.
I was dealt with courteously and professionally and supported the entire time hifx were dealing with my transaction. I felt a little foolish as an amateur but at no time was I made to feel like I was small fry or not worth dealing with. I am very happy I used Hifx.
